name: MiniRacers: Challenge
description:
[Work in progress]

Get ready to feel the speed in this arcade racing game. Play in different game modes with different cars. tracks and weathers.

#madewithunity


> Practice

Make your own free custom session.

> Time Attack

Race against your best time.

> Quick Race

Customize a session against AI vehicles. (Coming soon)

> Career Cup

Single player career. (Coming soon)


> Fire GTO
> Roadstar Touring > Formula K 2020
 > Italia
  • Campi Verde
> Brazil
  • Grande Lago. (Comming soon)
> Japan
  • Mamushi.  (Comming soon)
> Keyboard
  • Confirm - Enter / Return
  • Cancel / Pause - Escape / Backspace
  • Change View - C
  • Throttle - Up Arrow / W
  • Brake - Down Arrow / S
  • Steer Left - Left Arrow / A
  • Steer Right - Right Arrow / D
  • Gear Up [Manual Transmission] - Left Shift / Right Shift
  • Gear Down [Manual Transmission] - Left Alt / Right Alt
  • Handbrake [In Some Cars] - Space Bar
> Xbox Controller
  • Confirm - A
  • Cancel - B
  • Pause - Start
  • Change View - Back
  • Throttle - RT
  • Brake - LT
  • Steer Left - Left Axis / DPad Left
  • Steer Right - Left Axis / DPad Right
  • Gear Up [Manual Transmission] - Y
  • Gear Down [Manual Transmission] - X
  • Handbrake [In Some Cars] - B
[Coming Soon]
